item.title: Resume
item.description: Siddharth Chillale Software & Graphics Engineer (716) 903-2876 | schillal@buffalo.edu | www.linkedin.com/in/schillal | github.com/SiddharthChillale TECHNICAL EXPERIENCE Data Analyst Intern, Shaadi.com, Remote [04/2020 - 06/2020] Built an end-to-end pipeline for extraction, parsing and transformation of 300+ reports and loading into a visual frontend for analysis on domestic and international flights for the past 4 years. Improved workflow efficiency by 20% through automating pipeline for transformation from PDFs to CSVs. Analyzed data of Airports Authority of India (AAI) to gauge the effect of the COVID-19 pandemic on the economy of air travel.
